item.title: Major problem need urgent help! plz major prob!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

something to do with this.

npcs.moveY = MoveY;
                  }
                  npcs.updateRequired = true;
               } else if (npcs.RandomWalk == false && npcs.IsUnderAttack == true) {
                                                if(npcs.npcType == 1645 || npcs.npcType == 509 || npcs.npcType == 1241 || npcs.npcType == 1246 || npcs.npcType == 1159 || npcs.npcType == 54)
                                                AttackPlayerMage(i);
                                                else
                  AttackPlayer(i);
               } else if (npcs.followingPlayer && npcs.followPlayer > 0 && server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer] != null) {
                                                if(server.playerHandler.players[npcs.followPlayer].AttackingOn > 0) {
                                                int follow = npcs.followPlayer;
                                                npcs.StartKilling = server.playerHandler.players[follow].AttackingOn;
                                                npcs.RandomWalk = true;
                                                npcs.IsUnderAttack = true;
                                                if(npcs.StartKilling > 0) {
                                                if(npcs.npcType == 1645 || npcs.npcType == 509 || npcs.npcType == 1241 || npcs.npcType == 1246 || npcs.npcType == 54)
                                                AttackPlayerMage(i);
                                                else
                                                AttackPlayer(i);
                                                }

                                                }
